## PersistentCache.(constructor)

Construct a new persistent cache, typically used with [Limits](./faastjs.limits.md) as part of the arguments to [throttle()](./faastjs.throttle.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(
    dirRelativeToHomeDir: string, 
    expiration?: number);
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

dirRelativeToHomeDir


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The directory under the user's home directory that will be used to store cached values. The directory will be created if it doesn't exist.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

expiration


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The age (in ms) after which a cached entry is invalid. Default: `24*3600*1000` (1 day).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
